title: Semantria Excel Add-in - Oct. 2013
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------
Semantria Excel Add-In
------------------------------------------------------------------

The Semantria Excel Add-In the first and only tool that lets users perform text and sentiment analysis directly from within their Microsoft Office Excel program.

Semantria LLC, founded in 2011, is a software-as-a-service and services company specializing in cloud-based text and sentiment analysis. Semantria is a joint venture, co-founded by the leading text analytics technology provider Lexalytics (Boston, MA), amongst other investors.

Visit them at <a href="
http://www.semantria.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.semantria.com</a>

Uploaded on Oct. 7th, 2013

--------------------------
Features
--------------------------

Runs Right Inside Of Your Excel
The Semantria Excel add-in installs and runs directly in your Microsoft Excel.
You can perform sentiment analysis, categorization, entity extraction and much more, without needing to know a single line of code.

Wiki-dly Knowledgeable
Semantria is a genius out-of-the-box as it harnesses a comprehensive ontology that we created, based on Wikipedia, to categorize your content.
This means that you'll be spending little to no time training the engine and more time analyzing your content.

See Through Magnifying Glass Or Get A Bird's Eye View
Semantria's Basic mode extracts categories, mentions, opinions, sentiment, themes, and many more analytical features from each document your send for analysis. Basic mode gives you a detailed look a your collection of gathered data.
Semantria's Discovery Mode gives you analytical data, such as themes, sentiment and other analytical features, on your entire dataset. As opposed to looking at one document at a time, you'll be able to see what overall trends and ideas are being shared in your data.


--------------------------
Instructions
--------------------------

1. Determine which Windows operating system (XP, Vista, 7, or 8) you're using and which version (32bit or 64bit) you're using.


2. Determine which version of Microsoft Office (2007, 2010, or 2013) you're using and which version (32bit or 64bit) you're using.


3. Navigate to the appropriate file and install!

Example: If you're using Windows 7 64 bit and Office 2013 32 bit, navigate to...
-> Windows 7 64 bit
	-> Double click on "Semantria.ExcelAddIn.2013.x86"

Example: If you're using Windows Vista 32 bit and Office 2007 32 bit, navigate to...
-> Windows Vista 32 bit
	-> Double click on "Semantria.ExcelAddIn.2007.x86"

4. Once installed, open Excel and click on your new Semantria tab above the Excel ribbon.

5. Enjoy!

--------------------------
Notes
--------------------------

To use the add-in, you'll need a Semantria free trial account or a paid package. Visit https://semantria.com/user/ to create a free account!

Confused? Visit https://semantria.com/excel/overview for tutorial videos and guides to get you start quickly!

------------------------------------------------------------------
Thanks for downloading and feel free to share! This is freeware!!
------------------------------------------------------------------
